name: Two Incompatible Games
description:
In this simple ludumdare game,you will play Two Incompatible Games  at the same time,there are four different games.left game use A,S,D,W control,right game use arrow key control.

game one:You need to calculate the answer within the time，This tests your calculate power。

game two:You need to press a certain number of keys，This tests your hand speed

game three: When the enemy overlap with the button, press the button,This tests your ability to seize the opportunity

game four:You need to remember the key sequence，This test of memory ability
